snippet: A few major players dominate the market for historical hair strands and locks.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; only a few major players dominate market for historical hair strands and locks; Portrait of Place: Paintins, Drawing and Prints of New Jersey, 1761-1898 exhibit is on display at the Morven Museum and Garden in Princeton; Carnegie Museum of Art in Pittsburgh acquires newly discovered chandelier designed by Belgian innovator Henry van de Velde ahead of next year's celebration of the 150th anniversary of his death.
lead_paragraph: A few major players dominate the market for historical hair strands and locks.

headline.main: Historical Hair Locks Selling at Auctions
headline.print_headline: Wisps of Historical Hair From Graves and Barbers
